name: vibe-da-ibm-cloud
displayName: Vibe Landing Zone — IBM Cloud Edition
shortDescription: Deploy a whole mood — instantly and repeatedly.
longDescription: The Vibe Landing Zone deploys a fully functional static website on IBM Cloud Object Storage (Lite plan) with optional Cloud Functions that can write back to your bucket and trigger reapplications. Designed for creators, coders, and curious explorers alike — powered by IBM Cloud’s free-tier capabilities.

variables.name: region
variables.description: IBM Cloud region for hosting the website.

variables.name: resource_group
variables.description: IBM Cloud resource group where resources will be created.

variables.name: enable_functions
variables.description: Enable Cloud Functions to push updates or reapply your project.

variables.name: bucket_prefix
variables.description: Prefix for generated COS buckets (a random suffix is appended).

outputs.name: vibe_bucket_website_endpoint
outputs.description: Public website endpoint for the hosted app.

outputs.name: push_cos_url
outputs.description: Invoke URL for the push_to_cos action.

outputs.name: push_project_url
outputs.description: Invoke URL for the push_to_project action.
